flawed_nl_solution:
Tony and Dean together read 23 + 12 = <<23+12=35>>35 books
3 of these books were duplicates so Tony and Dean together read 35 - 3 = <<35-3=35>>35 unique books
All three read 35 + 17 = <<35+17=52>>52 books
Because the books are being counted three times, the book is counted 3 - 1 = <<3-1=2>>2 extra times.
All together they have read 52 - 2 = <<52-2=50>>50 different books
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 35. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
